title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{10x^2}{\left(-5x\right)}+\frac{5x}{\left(-5x\right)}-\frac{4}{\left(-5x\right)}$$

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
